author: mbautin
msg: [jira] [HBASE-5907] [89-fb] enhance HLog pretty printer to print additional useful stats
It would be useful for analysis purposes to enhance the HLog pretty printer to
optionally print a bunch of additional stats such as:
5) avg # of KVs written per txn
5) unique CF signatures involved in put/delete operatons; and breakdown of some
of the above metrics by these signatures, etc.

author: mbautin
msg: [master] Sort the assignment plan if necessary
After investigating some issues in DL cluster, we found the compareTo function in RegionInfo is quite expensive.
So it would be more efficient to use a hashmap instead of tree map inside of the assignment plan and only sort the assignment plan if necessary.

author: mbautin
msg: [89-fb] Allow atomic put/delete in one call: Port HBASE-3584 and HBASE-5203 to 0.89
Out for some initial thoughts on a few issues.
mr test. -- Test Failures on ext-89:

author: mbautin
msg: [jira] [HBASE-5879] [89-fb] Enable JMX metrics collection for the Thrift proxy
Summary: We need to enable JMX on the Thrift proxy on a separate port different
from the JMX port used by regionserver. This is necessary for metrics
- Verify that it is possible to collect metrics through JMX from the Thrift
